lyric.verse: Fukamidori iro shita GLASS wo kazashite Omae no koto nado wasureta tokku ni Koko wa arekureta machi nano dakara Amai kotoba nan te yokunaize tokku ni Fushidara na kotoba ga ni atteru tokku ni Fukamidori iro shita GLASS wo kazashite Omae no koto nado wasureta tokku ni

Moo nii-doo to aenai koto wa Moo nii-doo to kanjirenai koto ka Sore narawaba boku wa ima wo Toori koshita MACHINE ni notte Doko e yukoo yukisaki nan te Minna, minna motchainaize Dakara ioo aishiterutte Ima, me no mae no omae ni
Omai ni omae ni Aishiterutte ioo Omae ni omae ni Aishiterutte ioo
